description: Template for adding new entities and relationships to the Book of Mormon Knowledge Graph
instructions: 2. Replace the example data with your actual entities and relationships
3. Ensure all scriptural references are accurate
5. Submit a pull request with your changes

ai_prompts.add_entities: I'm working on a Book of Mormon knowledge graph. I need to add [entity type] entities from [specific book/chapter]. Please help me identify key entities, their scriptural references, and relationships. Format as JSON with nodes and edges arrays.
ai_prompts.find_relationships: Analyze these Book of Mormon entities and identify relationships between them: [paste entity list]. Focus on family, social, spiritual, geographical, and group relationships. Provide scriptural references for each relationship.
ai_prompts.verify_references: I have this relationship in my Book of Mormon knowledge graph: [paste relationship]. Please verify if this relationship is accurate according to the text, if the scriptural references are correct, and if there are additional references I should include.
